Chap. 3 - Individual Responsibility and Christian Unity.


                          Sanitarium, Cal., Jan. 16, 1907. 

     We are living in a time when every true Christian must maintain a living connection with God. The world is flooded with sophistries of the enemy, and we are safe only as we learn lessons of truth from the Great Teacher. The solemn work in which we are engaged 
                                                                           15
demands of us a strong, united effort under divine leadership.
